meta_description: Lake Jackson Historical Association (LJHA) is committed to providing education to the public relative to the history and culture of Lake Jackson and Brazoria County located in Texas.

collections_text:
# Welcome to the  
Lake Jackson Historical Association 

##### Our mission is to provide education relative to the history and culture of Lake Jackson, TX.

# [Learn More](https://www.ljhistory.org/calendar)

##### [Lake Jackson ](https://www.ljhistory.org/copy-of-lake-jackson-historical-mus)  
[Historical Museum ](https://www.ljhistory.org/copy-of-lake-jackson-historical-mus)

##### [Jackson Plantation ](https://www.ljhistory.org/jackson-plantation-historic-site-1)  
[Historic Site ](https://www.ljhistory.org/jackson-plantation-historic-site-1)

##### [Alden B. Dow ](https://www.ljhistory.org/abd)  
[Office Museum](https://www.ljhistory.org/abd)

Lake Jackson, TX 77566

​

Open Tuesday through Saturday

10 AM to 4 PM

​

Free Admission

Lake Jackson, TX 77566

​

Open the first Saturday of each month​

10 AM to 4 PM

​

Free Admission

Lake Jackson, TX 77566

​

10 AM to 4 PM

​

Free Admission
